entry.title: Inheritance of Shadows
entry.summary:
Author: IceBeHelmet

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,727Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Gotham never truly stops raining. Neither does Damian Wayne’s quiet, unyielding obsession.To Dick Grayson, Damian is still the boy he once mentored—intense, proud, a little too sharp around the edges, but harmless. He doesn’t see the way Damian watches him. He doesn’t feel the invisible bars rising around his life.When Damian vanishes from Gotham, Dick assumes it’s just another mission. But the black roses blooming across Blüdhaven say otherwise. Letters sealed in wax arrive at his window, their words soft at first—confessions disguised as apologies. But underneath lies a vow:“I’ve come to take you home.”Now, as Head of the Demon, Damian has everything he needs to make good on those words.🌹 It’s not a love story. It’s a possession.🌒 Slow-burn toxic obsession, soft dominance curdling into hard control, and a man who’s already lost before he realizes the game’s begun.
